code: export var categoryConverter={toFirestore:function toFirestore(category){return{title:category.title};},fromFirestore:function fromFirestore(snapshot){var data=snapshot.data();var obj=Object.assign({id:snapshot.id},data);return obj;}};export var optionConverter={toFirestore:function toFirestore(option){var obj={title:option.title,isChoices:option.isChoices,choices:option.choices};if(!obj.isChoices)delete obj.choices;return obj;},fromFirestore:function fromFirestore(snapshot){var data=snapshot.data();var obj=Object.assign({id:snapshot.id},data);if(!obj.isChoices)delete obj.choices;return obj;}};
